definition: police department/police station/abbr. of 警察局
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Police stations and offices of the ruling National Democratic Party were on fire across the country.
sentences.chinese: 全國各地的警局和執政黨黨部被焚燒。

sentences.english: The man was an undercover deputy from Iredell County Sheriff's Office.
sentences.chinese: 這名男子是愛戴爾郡警局的臥底警員。

sentences.english: Hello, this is the Foreign Affairs Police.
sentences.chinese: 您好，這裏是臺北市警局外事處。

sentences.english: A second blind spot is caused by the localised structure of the police.
sentences.chinese: 另一個盲點是由警局的地方結構造成的。

sentences.english: Indonesian police kill 5 villagers ransacking post .
sentences.chinese: 印尼發生村民衝擊警局事件，5人被打死。

sentences.english: The station he giving the investigation, said he had nothing to do with data.
sentences.chinese: 警局裏安哥授受調查，說資料與他無關。

sentences.english: She said he walked into the police station and then he collapsed at the custody desk.
sentences.chinese: 她說他走進警局，然後就在拘留手續臺前癱倒在地。

sentences.english: He was also assigned the duty of infiltrating the Czarist police.
sentences.chinese: 他又被派去滲透沙俄警局。

sentences.english: I was expecting you. Are you NYPD or FBI?
sentences.chinese: 恭候多時了。你們是紐約警局的還是聯邦調查局的？

sentences.english: The vehicle pulled out of the station, and they were on their way to Area F, the state headquarters of the police command.
sentences.chinese: 警車開出警局，往F區開去，那是國家的警察總部。

sentences.english: After the arrest Weinberg was bailed out by his wife and other supporters.
sentences.chinese: 溫伯格的妻子和其支持者隨後到警局將他保釋了出來。

sentences.english: Massachusetts State Police has a long tradition of excellence.
sentences.chinese: 馬塞諸塞州警局有着長久的優良傳統。

sentences.english: O.K., so I guess I’ll be calling the cops.
sentences.chinese: 好的，那我猜我要給警局打電話了。

sentences.english: Gallagher immediately began King's training at the police department's canine center.
sentences.chinese: 加拉赫立刻在警局警犬中心開始了訓練金的工作。

sentences.english: The president, René Préval, and his cabinet have been reduced to meeting in a police station.
sentences.chinese: 海地總統普雷瓦爾及其內閣被迫在一個警局開會。

sentences.english: It's not P. C. to admit you spank your child.
sentences.chinese: 這並非去警局供認你打了自己的孩子。

definition: police station (abbr. for 警察署[jing3 cha2 shu3])
abbr. for 國家安全局|国家安全局[Guo2 jia1 An1 quan2 ju2]
public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)
abbr. for 刑事警察[xing2 shi4 jing3 cha2]/criminal police
